@ctiller, yes - There is a PR for that https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/13137 by @iancoolidge .
(Will merge that one and the necessary code changes to *not* convert time to `GPR_CLOCK_REALTIME` before calling `gpr_cv_wait` shortly after merging this current PR)
Thank you for the fix, Sree.
It should be useful to put #13137 in a port_platform format?

**All failures are known**

- Basic Tests C++ Linux [dbg] (internal CI) — Internal CI build failed: https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/11008
- Basic Tests C++ Linux [opt] (internal CI) — Internal CI build failed: https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/13426

- Basic Tests MacOS [dbg] (internal CI) — Internal CI build failed: https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/13426 and https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/12932 (fixed by https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/13433)

- Basic Tests MacOS [opt] (internal CI) — Internal CI build failed:  (Same as MacOS[dbg])

- Basic Tests Multi-language Linux (internal CI) — Internal CI build failed: https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/13404 and https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/12932  (fixed by https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/13433)

- Basic Tests Windows [dbg] (internal CI) — Internal CI build failed: https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/13426

- Basic Tests Windows [opt] (internal CI) — Internal CI build failed: https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/13426

- Interop Cloud-to-Cloud Tests (internal CI) — Internal CI build failed: https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/13421

- Tsan C++ (internal CI) — Internal CI build failed: https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/13443
